body:
#### PR description:

PR #38692 has changed the default Beam Spot in the Run-3 Global Tag , which is now out-of-synch with the vertex smearing assumed for the Run-3  RelVal workflows, even if it is correct for the 2022 physics MC.
This PR fixes the problem by making `Realistic25ns13p6TeVEarly2022Collision` the default for Run-3 relval workflows and wherever it is necessary to change it in standalone configurations.

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles
